response.original_title: Interview with Lo Ting: An Oral History Project
response.overview: Lee Sin-yu wants to make a documentary about a friend and his dementia grandfather, who would occasionally say that his wife is "Lo Ting". Lee Sin-yu set out for the fishing village of Tap Mun to begin filming, and starts to understand the dark side of Lo Ting that has been hidden in history.
response.title: Interview with Lo Ting: An Oral History Project
